donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: The main objective of the project is to prevent HIV transmission and reduce social/economic impact of the HIV epidemic in Angola through the implementation of a multi/sectorial and integrated approach that reinforces and extends existing efforts in HIV prevention, treatment and surveillance while increasing institutional capacity, mobilizing and supporting people living with HIV&AIDS, coordinating partners and monitoring the distribution and use of resources.

project_descr: Reducing the Burden of HIV/AIDS in Angola
project_title: Reducing the Burden of HIV/AIDS in Angola
